nodes.text: Ran Harva was a male Human from Chandrila who served with Senator Mon Mothma of the Galactic Senate during the Clone Wars. He was the younger of her two co-Senators for the Bormea sector. In 21 BBY, Ran's wife was killed when Hanna City was attacked by General Lok Durd's superweapon and he returned to Chandrila in mourning.
